title: Redownload PBE
body:
So I'm a PBE player but I got a new computer and would like to still play on the PBE. Is there a way to re-download the client because obviously I don't have that email any more with the link or whatever. 
Anyone done this before?

replies.body: Hey, thanks Porocles!! So hyped to play the bird people ^_^
Well ok so does anyone know how to get it to be on your desk top? I have the file but it literally installs and updates every time I open it. Like I'm doing it for the first time.
